info.title: mapguide-rest
info.description:
mapguide-rest provides a REST API for MapGuide Open Source and Autodesk Infrastructure Map Server

 **NOTE:** Basic HTTP authentication credentials will generally be cached by the web browser for a short period should you choose to use this method instead of passing in session ids

get.summary: Returns the base library name for this coordinate system library

400.description: You supplied a bad request due to one or more missing or invalid parameters

401.description: Session ID or MapGuide credentials not specified

500.description: An error occurred during the operation

post.summary: Checks if the given coordinate system WKT string is valid

400.description: You supplied a bad request due to one or more missing or invalid parameters

401.description: Session ID or MapGuide credentials not specified

500.description: An error occurred during the operation

400.description: You supplied a bad request due to one or more missing or invalid parameters

get.summary: Queries features from the specified feature source

parameters.name: resourcePath
parameters.description: The path of the resource ID

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of proprety names

parameters.name: maxfeatures
parameters.description: The maximum number of features to restrict this response to

parameters.name: transformto
parameters.description: The CS-Map coordinate system code to transform the resulting features into

parameters.name: bbox
parameters.description: A comma-separated quartet (x1,y1,x2,y2) defining the spatial filter geometry

parameters.name: bboxistargetcs
parameters.description: Indicates if the bbox should be interpreted in the coordinate system specified in the transformto parameter

parameters.name: orderby
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of property names

parameters.name: pagesize
parameters.description: Applies pagination on the query result. This specifies the number of results for the page.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Applies pagination on the query result. This specifies the page number of the page. You must specify a valid page size value (> 0) for this parameter to apply.

400.description: You supplied a bad request due to one or more missing or invalid parameters

401.description: Session ID or MapGuide credentials not specified

500.description: An error occurred during the operation

put.summary: Updates one or more features into the given feature class for the specified feature source. The Feature Source in question must have _MgRestAllowUpdate=1 in its resource header otherwise updates will be forbidden. If _MgRestUseTransaction=1 in the resource header, transactions will be used.

parameters.name: resourcePath
parameters.description: The path of the resource ID

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The XML envelope describing the features to be update

400.description: You supplied a bad request due to one or more missing or invalid parameters

401.description: Session ID or MapGuide credentials not specified

403.description: Feature Source is not configured to allow updates

500.description: An error occurred during the operation

post.summary: Inserts one or more features into the given feature class for the specified feature source. The Feature Source in question must have _MgRestAllowInsert=1 in its resource header otherwise inserts will be forbidden. If _MgRestUseTransaction=1 in the resource header, transactions will be used.

parameters.name: resourcePath
parameters.description: The path of the resource ID

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The Feature Set XML describing the features to be inserted

parameters.name: X-MG-SESSION-ID
parameters.description: MapGuide Session ID, use this when there is no other means to pass a session id

400.description: You supplied a bad request due to one or more missing or invalid parameters

401.description: Session ID or MapGuide credentials not specified

403.description: Feature Source is not configured to allow inserts

500.description: An error occurred during the operation

delete.summary: Deletes one or more features from the given feature class for the specified feature source. The Feature Source in question must have _MgRestAllowDelete=1 in its resource header otherwise deletes will be forbidden. If _MgRestUseTransaction=1 in the resource header, transactions will be used.

parameters.name: resourcePath
parameters.description: The path of the resource ID

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: The FDO filter determining what features to delete

400.description: You supplied a bad request due to one or more missing or invalid parameters

401.description: Session ID or MapGuide credentials not specified

403.description: Feature Source is not configured to allow deletes

500.description: An error occurred during the operation

get.summary: Queries features from the specified layer definition. Any hyperlink, tooltip and elevation expressions in the Layer Definition will be computed and returned in the response

parameters.name: resourcePath
parameters.description: The path of the resource ID

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of property names. Has no effect if format is CZML

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: The FDO filter to apply. This will be combined with whatever filter is defined in the layer

parameters.name: maxfeatures
parameters.description: The maximum number of features to restrict this response to

parameters.name: transformto
parameters.description: The CS-Map coordinate system code to transform the resulting features into

parameters.name: mappedonly
parameters.description: If true, will use only the properties specified in the display mappings in the Layer Definition. Takes precedence over the properties parameter if both specified. Has no effect if format is CZML

parameters.name: displayproperties
parameters.description: If true, will use any display mappings specified in the Layer Definition, only applicable when mappedonly=1 and format is HTML/GeoJSON

parameters.name: includegeom
parameters.description: Include the geometry, only applicable when mappedonly=1. Has no effect if format is CZML

parameters.name: bbox
parameters.description: A comma-separated quartet (x1,y1,x2,y2) defining the spatial filter geometry

parameters.name: bboxistargetcs
parameters.description: Indicates if the bbox should be interpreted in the coordinate system specified in the transformto parameter

parameters.name: pagesize
parameters.description: Applies pagination on the query result. This specifies the number of results for the page. You cannot specify this parameter for CZML output

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Applies pagination on the query result. This specifies the page number of the page. You must specify a valid page size value (> 0) for this parameter to apply. You cannot specify this parameter for CZML output

400.description: You supplied a bad request due to one or more missing or invalid parameters

401.description: Session ID or MapGuide credentials not specified

500.description: An error occurred during the operation

get.summary: Queries features from the specified feature source

parameters.name: resourcePath
parameters.description: The path of the resource ID

parameters.name: property
parameters.description: The property name to get distinct values of. Only applies if aggregate type is 'distinctvalues'

400.description: You supplied a bad request due to one or more missing or invalid parameters

401.description: Session ID or MapGuide credentials not specified

get.summary: Plot the map to the specified type using the center and scale from the map

parameters.name: resourcePath
parameters.description: The path of the Map Definition

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: The X coordinate of the map center to plot

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: The Y coordinate of the map center to plot

parameters.name: dpi
parameters.description: The map display DPI to plot at. Defaults to 96 if not specified. Only applicable for PDF plots

parameters.name: printlayout
parameters.description: The PrintLayout resource to use for plotting. Only applies if plotting to DWF

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title to put in the plot

parameters.name: pdf_coords
parameters.description: Show coordinates in plot. PDF only

parameters.name: pdf_north_arrow
parameters.description: Show north arrow in plot. PDF only

parameters.name: pdf_scale_bar
parameters.description: Show scale bar in plot. PDF only

parameters.name: pdf_disclaimer
parameters.description: Show disclaimer in plot. PDF only

parameters.name: pdf_legend
parameters.description: Show legend in plot. PDF only

400.description: You supplied a bad request due to one or more missing or invalid parameters

401.description: Session ID or MapGuide credentials not specified

500.description: An error occurred during the operation

put.summary: Updates the map selection according to some spatial criteria

parameters.name: mapName
parameters.description: The name of the runtime map

parameters.name: layernames
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of layer names

parameters.name: geometry
parameters.description: The WKT of the intersecting geometry

parameters.name: maxfeatures
parameters.description: The maximum number features to select as a result of this operation

parameters.name: persist
parameters.description: If true, will cause this operation to modify the selection set

parameters.name: requestdata
parameters.description: A bitmask specifying the information to return in the response. 1=Attributes, 2=Inline Selection, 4=Tooltip, 8=Hyperlink

parameters.name: featurefilter
parameters.description: An XML selection string containing the required feature IDs

parameters.name: layerattributefilter
parameters.description: Bitmask value determining which layers will be queried. 1=Visible, 2=Selectable, 4=HasTooltips

parameters.name: selectionxml
parameters.description: Indicates if the 'featurefilter' parameter is to be treated as selection XML. Otherwise the input is treated as a SelectionUpdate XML document

parameters.name: append
parameters.description: Indicates if the this query selection indicated by the 'featurefilter' parameter should append to the current selection

400.description: You supplied a bad request due to one or more missing or invalid parameters

401.description: Session ID or MapGuide credentials not specified

500.description: An error occurred during the operation

get.summary: Gets the KML for the specified map definition

get.summary: Gets the KML for the specified layer definition

parameters.name: bbox
parameters.description: A comma-separated quartet (x1,y1,x2,y2) defining the spatial filter geometry. Coordinates must be LL84 coordinates

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: The display width of the KML viewport

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: The display height of the KML viewport

parameters.name: draworder
parameters.description: The draw order of this layer

400.description: You supplied a bad request due to one or more missing or invalid parameters

401.description: Session ID or MapGuide credentials not specified

500.description: An error occurred during the operation

AllowInsert.description: Allow inserts on this feature source

AllowDelete.description: Allow deletes on this feature source

AllowUpdate.description: Allow updates on this feature source

UseTransaction.description: Use transactions for inserts/updates/deletes. The feature source must support transactions for this to have any effect

Type.description: The type of the primitive value

CoordSys.description: The coordinate system code of the input geometry

Format.description: The desired output format of the buffered geometry. wkt or geojson

Units.description: The distance units. If not specified it will be assumed to be meters

TransformTo.description: The coordinate system code to transform the buffered geometry to

DefaultGeometryPropertyName.description: The name of the default geometry property. This must exist int the PropertyDefinition collection
